Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Rick K
Reviews.Content: I added a Foscam Wifi camera to the inside of my house that only needed power.  On the outside I had a wired Zmodo camera on the other side of the wall.  I bought this splitter to tap the existing power cable for my foscam.Downside is that Foscam uses a much smaller non-standard plug & this y cable is VERY short.  I needed to buy an adapter and another cable.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.1 mm center positive power plug splitter
Use with any 2.1mm male DC power adapter
1 DC female 2.1mm connection
2 DC male 2.1 mm connections
For DC power only
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Female to 2 Male 2.1mm CCTV Power Plug Splitter Cable for CCTV Security Camera Surveillance System 1UX
